item.description: I've done a meetup already for this band and we all had a good time. Their name is World Premier Band. Their a group of guys that dance their a** off and sing really well. They dress nicely and are definitely entertaining. They sing new and older songs. They do have a website on Facebook. We can meet at 9pm. if you'd like. I don't know the cover charge, but I can call the Charlie Horse when the date gets closer. I guarantee these guys will have you out on the dance floor! There has been a few times that I've organized meetups and people don't bother to change their rsvp. I ask that you be courteous about your rsvp. I think it's RUDE and UNECESSARY. We all have cell phones so please call me on mine to say you'll be late, or if you have any questions.  My num. is 508)287-3377. Thanks. See you soon. It'll be fun......
item.how_to_find_us: I'll wait outside of the front door at 9pm. and wait (for 15 min. ) after that I'm going inside!

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Dancing at the Charlie Horse
